body:
I'm working with the Run Energy Simulation component in Honeybee, and when I set the Boolean toggle to 'true' for both _writeIDF and runEnergyPlus_ inputs, I get no response. The component does nothing and stays orange. I have EnergyPlus installed on my system. In fact, the Honeybee_Honeybee component only gives me OpenStudio errors.



Any ideas what's wrong and how to fix this? See attached screenshot. Thank you so much for your response and feedback.
